plasma.diagnostics.name.title: Diagnostic
plasma.diagnostics.name.description: name of the applied diagnostics or modelling/simulation method. E.g. OES, LSD, LAAS, XPS, SEM, PIC-MCC, fluid-Poisson model

plasma.diagnostics.properties.title: Properties
plasma.diagnostics.properties.description: properties of the applied diagnostics which are not part of the resource metadata. E.g. laser diode at 395 nm and 50 mW

plasma.diagnostics.procedure.title: Procedure
plasma.diagnostics.procedure.description: details of the applied diagnostic procedures which are not part of the resource metadata. E.g. voltage is measured between the contact tube of the welding torch and the workpiece
